mapper.select: SELECT i.inquirie_id, i.type, i.title, i.content, i.create_at, i.status, i.answer, i.admin_create_at, u.user_id FROM inquiries i JOIN users u ON i.user_no = u.user_no AND i.status = 'Y' ORDER BY i.inquirie_id DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiries (user_no, type, title, content) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiries SET answer = #{answer}, type = #{type}, admin_create_at = NOW() WHERE inquirie_id = #{inquirieId}
